ReformedTech is looking for an experienced and forward-thinking senior backend engineer to join our top-notch engineering team.
Candidates should be self-motivated professionals who have experience working with building long-lasting data models and APIs (both as a provider and client of APIs). A broad set of experiences is ideal - creating and maintaining simple, easy-to-use services is core to the role. Scalable workflows and robust cloud deployments are all important skills to have or develop.
As Senior Engineer you'll have a great deal of autonomy so you should be organized, outspoken, and love creating great products.
